title: Package Request
description: Package configuration for media buy creation

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for this package

product_id.description: Product ID for this package (recommended - replaces deprecated products array)

products.description: DEPRECATED: Use product_id instead. Array of product IDs - only first product will be used

format_ids.description: Array of format IDs that will be used for this package - must be supported by the product

items.description: Format ID referencing a format from list_creative_formats

budget.description: Budget allocation for this package in the media buy's currency

pricing_option_id.description: ID of the selected pricing option from the product's pricing_options array

bid_price.description: Bid price for auction-based pricing (required if the selected pricing_option has is_fixed: false)

creative_ids.description: Creative IDs to assign to this package at creation time
